groovyx.gaelyk.plugins
[Groovy] Class PluginResourceSupport

java.lang.Object
  groovyx.gaelyk.plugins.PluginResourceSupport

class PluginResourceSupport
extends Object

This class provides support for accessing resources from the binary plugins.

Authors:
Vladimir Orany

PLUGIN_RESOURCES_PREFIX

Method Detail

getPluginFileURL

static URL getPluginFileURL(String folder, String name)
Obtains the URL for the given file for specified folder and name.
throws:
ResourceException if given file doesn't exist
Parameters:
folder - the name of the folder in binary plugin such as "groovy" for groovlets or "templates" for gtpl files
name - name of file to be found
Returns:
URL for the given file for specified folder and name

getResourceConnection

static URLConnection getResourceConnection(String folder, String name)
Obtains the resource connection to the given file for specified folder and name.
throws:
ResourceException if given file doesn't exist
Parameters:
folder - the name of the folder in binary plugin such as "groovy" for groovlets or "templates" for gtpl files
name - name of file to be found
Returns:
resource connection to the given file for specified folder and name

isPluginPath

static boolean isPluginPath(String path)
Checks whether the given path belongs to binary plugin.
Parameters:
path - path to be checked
Returns:
true if the given path belongs to binary plugin
